org.js4ms.io.net

Class UdpDatagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.js4ms.common.util.logging.LoggableBase
      • org.js4ms.io.net.UdpDatagram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loggable

    public final class UdpDatagram
extends LoggableBase
    A representation of a UDP datagram.
    Author:
    Gregory Bumgardner (gbumgard)
